# HTML Widgets

## Dygraph

```{r echo=FALSE, fig.height=3, fig.width=6}
library(dygraphs)
dygraph(nhtemp, main = "New Haven Temperatures") %>% 
  dyRangeSelector(dateWindow = c("1920-01-01", "1960-01-01"))
```

## Issues with HTML Widgets

* Cannot cannot add a caption
* Cannot add text to slide
* Inserts an empty slide after

-------     ------ ----------   -------

## kable

```{r, echo=FALSE}
knitr::kable(head(iris))
```

## pixiedust

```{r eval=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(pixiedust)
fit <- lm(mpg ~ qsec + factor(am) + wt + factor(gear), data = mtcars)
dust(fit) %>% 
  sprinkle(cols = c("estimate", "std.error", "statistic"), round = 2)
```

```
Error in print.dust(x) : 'pptx' is not an valid print method
Calls: <Anonymous> ... knit_print.default -> normal_print -> print -> print.dust
```

## flextable

```{r, eval=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(flextable)
flextable(head(mtcars))
```

```
Error in knit_print.flextable(x, ...) : 
  unsupported format for flextable rendering:pptx
Calls: <Anonymous> ... fun -> withVisible -> knit_print -> knit_print.flextable
```

## Issues with Tables

* Cannot add text to a slide with a table
* Table from pixiedust not recognized
* Table from flextable not recognized
